# Remove /etc/profile.d files in favor of loadable modules when available
if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.csh` = 0; then echo 'setenv MODULEPATH /opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.csh fi if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.sh` = 0; then echo 'export MODULEPATH=/opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.sh fi
if test -f /etc/profile.d/nwchem.sh; then
/bin/rm -f /etc/profile.d/nwchem.* /bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/nwchem
#%Module1.0 prepend-path PATH /opt/nwchem/bin
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "5.1.1"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/nwchem/.version.5.1.1 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/nwchem/.version fi
